title: The Lion of Palmyra: A Yaoi Novel of the Crusades
description: “It takes courage to surrender.”His city under siege, his army decimated, Amir-el-Assad was bound by a promise to his dying surrender the city and wait for reinforcements to liberate Palmyra from its conquerors.While Amir hides in the shadows and bides his time, William of Woodsworth fights a different kind of he must choose between a forbidden love and his honour as a Crusader.On the sidelines, two other men watch and Geoffrey, the squire whose devotion to William is shattered by the arrival of the mysterious Zeena; and Manouh, the exotic bed slave whose hunger for pleasure hides a broken heart.The war has ended, but the battle has just begun. The fate of the city will not be decided in the battlefield...but in the bedroom. this book is intended for mature audiences only. 18+
author: Julia von Rist
